attributes.title: GARBAGE APP
attributes.review: I have never struggled with an app so much before. TERRIBLE APP.  It completely shut down my entire phone and I have to get an entirely new one. Thanks trump. You ruined another good thing for me. This app needs to be deleted so that other people don’t experience what I experienced.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: While I was trying show my very I’ll grandfather the app that took almost a month to download the app glitched as soon as I opened it that app basically fell apart while doing so my grandfather passed away due to the flashing lights this app has apparently caused more deaths

attributes.title: Michelle Obama 2020
attributes.review: This app is very bad. I’m downloaded it to see what our president was like and why to vote for him again. I didn’t find any reasons why I should. Trump is America’s worst president. Obama was way better. Trump supporters all lives matter even though black lives are in danger.

attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: After looking at this app for just 45.3 seconds, I have already lost my ability to see, hear, and possess the cognitive ability to understand the foolishness going on. Terrible experience, don’t recommend.

attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: I was hoping to get some information about the campaign and really make an educated decision. The app was slow to download and I kept getting knocked off the site. I found that the content was completely one sided and biased. Very bad

attributes.title: This is just the worst
attributes.review: I wanted to look on the bright side for trump because maybe he still had a chance but he’s not doing anything about these cops, trying to ban Tik tok from America, and just overall he has been the worst president 😒😒

attributes.title: 💓✨🌸 bye bye trump 💓✨🌸
attributes.review: this app is not valuable to me because I will not be voting for trump now or ever. thank you for taking so much time to make a whole app for your campaign instead of running our country. do not download this app and give him the attention that he so desperately crave.

attributes.title: I lost my eyes 🤬😡
attributes.review: First of all the app was downloading for about 2 hours. It kept on crashing when i loaded in the app. Then after it stopped crashing i went to the help system because I was confused. When i clicked on it I saw our presidents NUDES.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I really wanted to to you know support our Cheeto Puff President but this app is horrendous. It constantly made my phone glitch and takes way tooo long to load. Him being a racist doesn’t help either but since he’s our president being racist is okay 🧚🏽🧚🏽‍♂️🧚🏽‍♀️✨✨

attributes.title: umm
attributes.review: y’all i just wanted to get the app and educate my on our president mr. trump because i didn’t believe all the things that people were saying about him. so came here and downloaded it and as soon as i opened the app the my phone was glitching so bad i couldn’t even leave the app. it took a good hour to get my phone working properly but it still kinda messed up my phone and i’m not very happy about it! 😭 so this is why i had to give this app a one star review i am so sorry 😘
